alert.note: Alert for Eastern Interior (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued June 09 at 7:04AM ADT until June 11 at 6:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Prolonged periods of dangerously hot temperatures and high humidity likely with heat indices of 108 Fahrenheit or more. * WHERE...along the urban and coastal areas of Puerto Rico. * WHEN....For the Excessive Heat Advisory, through 5 PM AST today. For the Excessive Heat Watch through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The combination of hot temperatures and high humidity will create dangerous situations in which heat related illnesses are possible.
info.instruction: A Heat Advisory means that a period of hot temperatures is expected. The combination of hot temperatures and high humidity will combine to create a situation in which heat illnesses are possible. Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency, call 9 1 1.
